biography: Ricke, a name well-known in golfing circles, is recognized for his calm demeanor on the course. While details about his home club remain elusive, his presence has certainly been felt in past Hector Trophée tournaments.

With two appearances at the Hector Trophée, Ricke has demonstrated a commitment to the sport and this event. Although he has yet to secure a victory at the Hector Trophée or claim the Victor Trophy, his participation has added to the competitive spirit of the tournament.

Currently considered retired from Hector events, Ricke's absence from the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 may be a disappointment to some. However, golf enthusiasts know that the world of sports can be unpredictable, and a return is always a possibility.
